item.title: myGeoBook is building geolocation tools for any website
item.description: myGeoBook is about geolocation & social media, with a set of tools for any website developer to use. Maps maybe sexy to some people and yes everyone is talking about mobile location services right now ([ id=”232″ type=”category”]Foursquare[/] anyone). Here’s a very short guide on how to add a map to WordPress using myGeoBook — but first, here’s an example. This map is based on the Frommers best restaurants in Europe.

item.title: Gowalla? Foursquare open for Business? Who will setup a business team in Europe First
item.description: Foursquare is now open to business and is moving beyond geo-tagging and location based social networking. But is Foursquare really open to business? After trying to claim my business location and setup an offer for visitors its now been 3 weeks without a reply. In the UK right now, I believe there is an opportunity for Gowalla, Foursquare, etc to setup a small but viable business team to work with digital agencies or mobile marketing specialists here.
